samhita: dhRuShTi#raqsiq brahma# yaqcCaq apEti# aqgnEq aqgnim aaqmAda#m jahiq niShkra#vyAdaqmiti# kravya- ada$m sEqdhaq Eti# dEqvaqyajaqmiti# dEva-yaja$m vaqhaq nirda#gdhaqmitiq niH - daqgdhaqm rakShO# nirda#gdhAq itiq niH - daqgdhAqH arA#tayO dhruqvam aqsiq pRuthiqvIM dRuq(gm)qhaq ayu#r dRu(gm)ha praqjAmiti# pra -jAm dRuq(gm)qhaq saqjAqtAniti# sa-jAqtAn aqsmai yaja#mAnAya parIti# uqhaq dhaqrtram aqsyaqntari#kSham dRuq(gm)qhaq prAqNamiti# pra- aqnam dRuq(gm)qhaq cakShu#r-
